Table	Create Table
share_notifications	CREATE TABLE `share_notifications` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `fromUserId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `itemType` enum('task','habit') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `itemId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `itemTitle` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `isRead` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `fk_1` (`userId`),
  KEY `fk_2` (`fromUserId`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`userId`) REFERENCES `jdYJzsjjq9oKQ4uf2Lq74q`.`users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  CONSTRAINT `fk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`fromUserId`) REFERENCES `jdYJzsjjq9oKQ4uf2Lq74q`.`users` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
